column5: The Original Liberty Schoolhouse has been restored and rejuvenated with 21st century conveniences.  A short walk to Eagle Mountain Lake, 30 minutes from downtown Ft. Worth , 45 minutes from Texas Motor Speedway. This suite is called The Liberty Suite. Sleeping 2, in a pillow top king bed. Boasts of a jacuzzi and fireplace.  Coffee, sodas and water are complimentary.  Breakfast included.  Mr. Pibb ( a handsome pug) and Sandi Jo (a large mix) like to greet the guests.    No other pets please.
column8: The Liberty Suite at The Old Liberty Schoolhouse
